dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found Lamont's body.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: You know, a tiny part - a damn stupid part - of me hoped he was still out there. What happened?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: They bought themselves a ticket off-world, but they were attacked while waiting for it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm not exactly clear on the details. I just found, uh... a lot of body parts.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: They got sloppy. Looked like mantisaurs got 'em.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Damn. Well, you find our box of memories?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I did. Here you go.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Yeah. I'm lucky to be alive, you know.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, shit. Thanks for finding it, at least. Don't gotta wonder anymore.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Funny thing, I found a list of agents in that outpost. You aren't on it.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Heh. Well, ain't you clever. Fine - I was supposed to pick 'em up that night. Thing is, another offer came along. Bit more lucrative.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You abandoned them? They died out there!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I get it. Tell you the truth, I'd probably do the same.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let me guess. That's not a box of "memories."

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: And their payment almost died with 'em. Thanks to you, I can afford another round. Cheers, hero.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look, I like your gumption. I was gonna share the bits, but here's a couple extra.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now go on - leave an old man to his past.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right, I'm going.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Ugh, I should have kept those bits.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Then you're smarter than the average rapt. Next round's on me - a token of my deepest gratitude for solving a decade-long mystery.

dialog.speaker: Kane (Male)
dialog.utterance: Surely ain't. But it'll buy me some better ones.
